metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11221 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GPAC 0.7.1 has a buffer overflow issue in gf_import_message() in media_import.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-11221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5
gpac-modules-base - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5
libgpac10 - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5').
